section.name: System
section.description: These are configurable system settings. Change them only if you know what you are doing!

setting.name: Debugging
setting.description: If set to true, reporting will be verbose and all events will be recorded to the log file for the purpose of debugging errors.

setting.name: User Name
setting.description: The name of the person using this system.

setting.name: Interface Language ID Code
setting.description: The language ID code that sets the language to be used in the user interface.

setting.name: Log File Length
setting.description: This is the maximum number of lines that will be permited to be in the log file. This is necessary because RPM records all events in one log file.

setting.name: System Initialization Date
setting.description: Time stamp of when the system was installed.

section.name: Resources
section.description: This section contains the location of addition resources the user may wish to access. Note resources in these specified locations will override any in the system of the same name.

setting.name: Fonts Collection Path
setting.description: The full path to where fonts are kept on this system that the user would like to access. Note that there must be a valid XML description file for each font family.

setting.name: Illustrations Collection Path
setting.description: The full path to where illustrations are kept on this system that the user would like to access. Note that there must be a valid XML description file for each illustration collection.

section.name: Project File Names
section.description: Any file name that is, or could be, shared between system modules needs to be stored here.

setting.name: User Configuration File Name
setting.description: The user/system configuration file where all fundamental system information is kept (like this setting).

setting.name: Project Error Log File Name
setting.description: The general project error log file.

section.name: Project Folder Names
section.description: Any folder name that is, or could be, shared between system modules needs to be stored here.

setting.name: Project Configuration Folder Name
setting.description: The project configuration folder where all configuration files are kept.

setting.name: Project Macros Folder Name
setting.description: The folder where all processing scripts and macros are kept.

setting.name: Project Fonts Folder Name
setting.description: The folder where all the fonts for a project are kept.

setting.name: Project Text Folder Name
setting.description: The folder where all working text to be processed is kept.

setting.name: Project Text Folder Name
setting.description: The folder where hyphenation information files are kept.
